name: Devroop Saha
bio: Trying to view the world through a data-driven lens.

top_projects.name: navilaw-ai
top_projects.description: AI powered legal research engine. The system is based on multi AI agentic RAG systems leveraging the power of Llama3 LLM

top_projects.name: toxicity-prediction-ai-bionnovate-Visonx.py
top_projects.description: A model to predict the toxicity of a given compound through its SMILES notation

top_projects.name: Chirpy
top_projects.description: It is an AI-powered integration for Sparrow, revolutionizing API management with context-aware chatbots and automated workflows. It leverages the power of RAG, Prompt engineering and Llama3 to streamline developer tasks and enhance API lifestyle.

top_projects.name: LangChat
top_projects.description: A RAG based QnA Application over the LangChain documentation.

top_projects.name: Elevate
top_projects.description: This project implements and visualizes various disk scheduling algorithms using the analogy of elevators in a building. The primary algorithms include FCFS, SSTF, SCAN, LOOK, and their circular versions.

top_projects.name: NovaAI
top_projects.description: This multi-AI agent system has been developed to automate research and writing blogs. On the basis of the given topic as input, it researches and fetches all the  content related to that particular topic and accordingly , it jots down a comprehensive blog or a structured document based on the fetched content.

top_projects.name: FitVid
top_projects.description: This is AI powered video based gym trainer, that monitors the form of gym exercises.

top_projects.name: Dinesh-FitChat
top_projects.description: This is a RAG based chatbot that acts like a fitness trainer and gives fitness advice on training, diet or motivation.

profile_summary:
Devroop Saha is a highly skilled data-driven professional with a strong expertise in leveraging Jupyter Notebook and Python to drive insights and innovation. With a keen eye for detail and a passion for exploring complex data sets, Devroop adeptly navigates the intricacies of data analysis and visualization, consistently delivering high-quality solutions that inform business decisions and drive growth. 

As an active member of the developer community with a tangible network of 13 followers and an impressive portfolio of 32 public repositories, Devroop has established himself as a reliable and accomplished professional in the field. His dedication to staying at the forefront of industry trends and advancements, coupled with his commitment to sharing knowledge and expertise, solidifies his position as a valuable asset to any organization seeking to harness the power of data-driven insights.
